Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Johnson is keen to use the tricky wicket to their advantage.
Canada is prepared for a tough challenge ahead when they take on Pakistan at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium on June 11, 2024.
Canadian batsman Aaron Johnson shared the significance of the win for the North American nation.
Johnson stated in the pre-match conference that the win against Ireland is historic and will drive investment in Canadian cricket.
Johnson added that Canada has to take it in stride and keep moving forward.
A loss for Pakistan would eliminate them from the tournament, having already dropped points to the USA and India in their opening two games.
Canada would draw level with the top two teams from Group A, India and USA, at four points if they win.
Canada and Pakistan have only locked horns once, back in 2008, when Pakistan secured a 35-run win in the T20 Canada.
Johnson believes that the tricky wicket levels the playing field and Canada is looking to use that to their advantage.
